segments.title: Reconnect with previous customers
segments.description: Users who have not transacted with me since 15 days

segments.title: Upsell to existing customers
segments.description: Users who transacted for less that Rs. yyyy with me in last 30 days

segments.title: Active Paytm users
segments.description: Users with monthly transactions on Paytm > Rs.yyyy (yyyy = Rs. 300, 500, 750)

segments.title: Target new customers
segments.description: Users who shop on similar merchant but not me
